title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 4104/86 of 23 December 1986 modifying Regulation (EEC) No 3611/84 fixing the conversion factors for frozen squid
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 4104/86
of 23 December 1986
modifying Regulation (EEC) No 3611/84 fixing the conversion factors for frozen squid
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The text of part (a) of the Annex to Regulation (EEC) No 3611/84 concerning the conversion factors for different species and presentations of squid Loligo spp. of heading 03.03 B IV a) 1 aa) of the Common Customs Tarif is replaced by the following text:
1.2.3 //  //  //  // 'Species  // Presentation  // Conversion factor   //   1,3 // (a) Loligo spp (CCT heading No 03.03 B IV a) 1 aa)  //  // 1.2.3 //  //  //  // Loligo patagonica  // Not cleaned Cleaned  // 1,00 1,20   //    //   //  // Loligo vulgaris   // Not cleaned Cleaned  // 2,00 2,40  //    //   //   // Loligo pealei   // Not cleaned Cleaned  // 1,20 1,40   //    //   //   // Other species   // Not cleaned Cleaned  // 1,10 1,30'   //    //   //

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 January 1987.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 23 December 1986.
For the Commission
Antรณnio CARDOSO E CUNHA
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 379 of 31. 12. 1981, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 202 of 25. 7. 1986, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 333 of 21. 12. 1984, p. 41.
(4) OJ No L 365 of 24. 12. 1986, p. 8.
